org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.layers

Interface LayerDrawingListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VectorialLayerEdited

    public interface LayerDrawingListener

    LayerDrawingListener defines listeners to catch and handle drawing events from layers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterLayerDraw(LayerDrawEvent e)
      Process to execute after a layer had been drawn.

      Process to execute before a GraphicLayer had been drawn.
      void beforeLayerDraw(LayerDrawEvent e)
      Called before a layer of type FLayer or FLayers is drawn.

                     throws CancelationException

        Throws:
        CancelationException - if cancels the operation, this exception will have the message that user will see.
